attributes.action: I would like to reverse my vote to leave the European Union.
attributes.background: Given the quick reversal of many promises provided by "The Leave Campaign" as well as the apparent lack of a clear plan to achieve many of the promises.  I think I would like to change my vote.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
